availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Lee (Brown County, IL, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Brown County, Illinois, farmer and justice of the peace. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Ann Lee. Father of Cordelia M. Lee, Elizabeth E. Lee, Hetta Ann Lee, W. H. Lee, and George H. Lee. Farmer in Brown County, Illinois, in 1850. Justice of the peace in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Township 1SR4W, p. 159B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Lee, p. 862.
"William Lee (1817-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #25981445, accessed August 24, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25981445.
